system.description:
The School of magic involved with healing Injuries and diseases, as well as removing damaging and crippling effects. Spells of this School only require incantations to cast, which are often phrased in the form of prayers.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Help rolls to resist or recover from disease

1

Recover Health or Will equal to the margin

2

Allow a recovery roll with a bonus of the margin
